svg.title: sinc and si functions
svg.desc:
si function (red): si(x) = sin(x) / x
sinc function (blue): sinc(x) = sin(pi*x) / (pi*x)
Plotted with cubic BÃ©zier Curves. Symbols in "Computer Modern" (TeX) Font embedded. Created with a plain Text Editor.
From Wikimedia Commons.
